name: Home

# Kazufumi Yamana  
Economist  
[Policy Research Institute](http://www.mof.go.jp/english/pri/index.htm)  
[Ministry of Finance](http://www.mof.go.jp/english/index.htm)  
Japanese Government  

## Contact
3-1-1 Kasumigaseki, Chiyoda-ku  
Tokyo, 100-8940 JAPAN  

### E-mail
* kazufumi.yamana **atmark** mof.go.jp
* kz.yamana **atmark** gmail.com

## Research interests 
* [Macroeconomics](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macroeconomics)
* [Computational statistics](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computational_statistics)
* [Computational economics](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computational_economics)

## Languages
* *[Python](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language))*
* [MATLAB](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MATLAB)

## Lecture
* 東京工業大学『経済学A』非常勤講師(2016)
* 千葉大学『経済統計II』非常勤講師(2016)
* 財務省『基礎統計学』『統計基礎』『時系列演習』講師(2016)
* 財務省『時系列演習』講師(2015)
* 神奈川大学『経済情報処理』非常勤講師(2014)

## Outing  

### Conferences
* JEA, June 2016
* JSS, March 2016
* JEA, May 2015
* JEA, October 2014
* [International conference "Econometrics for Macroeconomics and Finance"](http://www.econ.hit-u.ac.jp/~koho/english/events/conference20140315-16_program.html), March 2014

### Others
* [DSGE_WS](http://www.kengonutahara.com/dsge-workshop), July 2016
* JCER, January 2016
* Kyoto univ., January 2016
* SWET, August 2014
